metadata.name: Macbeth
metadata.description: When three witches tell general Macbeth that one day he'll be the next king of Scotland, that prophesy will send him spiraling into a vortex of madness and murder. Torn between his conscience and his lust for power, he sets out on a path that will cost him everything he holds dear. The allure of the crown does not taste so sweet when you can't tell your friends from your enemies anymore. Blood will demand more blood.
